thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning and a very Happy New Year from all of us at The Wall Street Journal,
Persian Spring?
The biggest protests in Iran since 2009 have backed the government into a corner, and the Trump administration is threatening fresh sanctions if it cracks down. President Hassan Rouhani, who has been a favorite of Iranâ€™s moderates, is now under fire from a young population eager for change. Since September, scattered demonstrations focused on the economy have been percolating in multiple cities, and at least 12 protesters have... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
